infrastructure.name: Basic Sea Route
infrastructure.description: A basic shipping lane between two ports. Required for ship operations.

infrastructure.name: Premium Sea Route
infrastructure.description: An optimized shipping lane with priority access and weather monitoring.

infrastructure.name: Basic Air Route
infrastructure.description: A standard air cargo route between airports. Required for plane operations.

infrastructure.name: International Shipping License
infrastructure.description: Permits operation on international routes. Opens access to global markets.

infrastructure.name: Hazardous Materials License
infrastructure.description: Permits transport of hazardous materials with higher profit margins.

infrastructure.name: Logistics Specialist
infrastructure.description: An expert who optimizes route efficiency and reduces operational costs.

infrastructure.name: AI Route Optimizer
infrastructure.description: Advanced AI system that continuously optimizes all routes for maximum profit.
